title: Impact Advisors Ranked #16 on Modern Healthcare's Best Places to Work in Healthcare List
text:
Impact Advisors, LLC
Firm ranked among the top HIT companies
CHICAGO , Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Impact Advisors, LLC, a leading provider of healthcare information technology services, is pleased to announce that it has been ranked #16 out of 100 on Modern Healthcare's Best Places to Work in Healthcare list and is the #9 ranked supplier. The firm is also ranked among the top healthcare IT consulting firms to make the prestigious list. This is the sixth consecutive year that Impact Advisors has been recognized by Modern Healthcare .
"We are very humbled to have received this ranking on Modern Healthcare's Best Places to Work in Healthcare list," said Andy Smith , President and Co-Founder of Impact Advisors. "Our firm's success is a direct result of our Associates' dedication and commitment, and our top priority will always be to provide them with a rewarding place to work."
Modern Healthcare's Best Places to Work in Healthcare list was announced in August, and the rankings were announced on October 14 at a gala in Nashville . The list honors workplaces, both suppliers and providers, throughout the healthcare industry that empower their employees to provide patients and customers with the best possible care, products and services. The list was compiled using information gathered from employers and employees of companies with at least 25 employees. Employees were asked to evaluate their employer in eight areas, including leadership and planning, culture and communications, role satisfaction, working environment, relationships with supervisor, training and development, pay and benefits and overall satisfaction. To view the complete list of rankings, click here .
"Our recent ranking on Modern Healthcare's Best Places to Work in Healthcare list is really something to celebrate," said Michael Nutter , Director of Firm Culture and Associate Satisfaction. "At Impact Advisors, we believe that creating a culture of caring is simple. It's about genuinely caring about your employees and going the extra mile."
Impact Advisors adds this latest honor to a growing list of workplace awards that includes Crain's Fast Fifty, Consulting Magazine's Best Firms to Work For, Becker's Hospital Review's Best Places to Work in Healthcare and Inc. 5000's Fastest Growing Companies in America. In addition, Chief Operating Officer Todd Hollowell received honors as one of Consulting Magazine's Top 25 Consultants of 2015.
For more information on Impact Advisors, visit www.impact-advisors.com or visit the company on Facebook www.facebook.com/impactadvisors .
About Impact Advisors, LLC
Impact Advisors, a distinguished healthcare information technology consulting firm, improves its clients' healthcare delivery through technology. As a trusted healthcare leader, the firm helps hospitals and health systems maximize clinical and operational performance with its Best in KLAS® strategic advisory, implementation and optimization services. Since its inception, Impact Advisors has consulted to more than 140 hospitals and health systems nationally and internationally. The firm has earned a number of industry and workplace quality awards including Best in KLAS® for seven consecutive years, Healthcare Informatics HCI 100, Crain's Chicago Business Fast Fifty and Modern Healthcare's Best Places to Work. For more information about Impact Advisors, visit www.impact-advisors.com .
